content: irresistibly sweet crochet coasters featuring a central textured daisy motif these coasters whip up quickly and are a practical relaxing and satisfying project make with one color two colors an ombre colorway or with mix of variegated and solid colors the options are endless perfect for gifting as a set with a funky mug or a cute coffee keep cup for raok drops or market stall stock > available for 50% off until end of day utc 27/06/25 - standard sale no coupon required **pattern details ** refer to appendix a for example project details * skill level intermediate * yarn dk/8ply/cat 3 weight yarn ~8-12g/0 35-0 4oz per coaster low-pill or non-pill easy wash fibre such as cotton cotton blends bamboo blends and certain acrylics * hook use yarn label instructions as a guide for selecting hook size swatch to determine the optimal hook size for your gauge * coaster size varies with yarn and number of rounds completed ~12cm/4 75in for 5 rounds in dk * gauge specific gauge not required * stitch terminology us refer to abbreviations and special stitch instructions * pattern synopsis constructed in 5 to 6 rounds flo overlay 2trcl stitches form a central textured daisy motif puff and optional 3lo/post stitches provide additional texture in later rounds * social media share tag me @thecrochetfix #daisydayscoasters **acknowledgements ** many thanks to the following testers tania barry @shewgirlscrochetcreations on ig shewgirl on ravelry cathryn @burli_makes on ig burli on ravelry jennifer snedden @keelawee on ig keelawee on ravelry sharon edwards @sharon_edwards_act on ig defencelass on ravelry mary anne guarini @mguarini on ravelry sheela bijea @sheelabijea on ig kaikelasa on ravelry robin sullivan @sullivans7blessings on ig doughgirl143 on ravelry rita miller @ritamillerla on ig desktopdcrochet on fb ritamiller on ravelry
